content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (22.5, -7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at Position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at Position (4.5, -10.5)
- Pipe network connecting these entities, including positions (21.5, -10.5), (20.5, -10.5), (22.5, -10.5), (20.5, -9.5), (20.5, -8.5), (20.5, -7.5), (20.5, -6.5), (20.5, -5.5)
- Small Electric Poles at Positions (24.5, -7.5), (24.5, -6.5), (22.5, -4.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5)
- Inserter at Position (7.5, 5.5) and (9.5, 5.5)
- Belt Group connecting the furnace to the assembling machine

### Iron Ore Mining Site
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-11.0, 20.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-11.5, 18.5)

### Storage and Transport System
Consists of:
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-3.5, 0.5), (-3.5, 2.5), (8.5, 5.5), (-11.5, 18.5)
- Inserters at Positions (-3.5, 1.5), (7.5, 5.5), (9.5, 5.5)
- Transport Belts at Positions (10.5, 5.5), (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 6.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters have access to the necessary source items. Check if the source container or belt has the required items available for the inserter to pick up.

### No Ingredients to Smelt in Furnaces
- Make sure that the furnaces have the necessary raw materials to process. Check the supply chain to ensure that raw materials are being delivered to the furnaces.

### Assembling Machine Missing Resources
- Verify that the assembling machine has all the required ingredients to produce the desired item. In this case, ensure that copper plates are available for copper cable production.

### Boiler Out of Fuel
- Regularly check and refuel the boiler to maintain continuous operation. Ensure a steady supply of fuel to prevent interruptions in steam production.
